meanings.definition: A large marine fish with a sleek body and a pointed snout.
meanings.sent1: The tuna swam gracefully in the ocean.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy eating tuna sandwiches for lunch.
meanings.sent3: Why did the tuna bring a suitcase to the ocean? To have a 'tuna' vacation!
meanings.sent4: Her speed on the track was like a tuna slicing through water.
meanings.sent5: The shimmering scales of the tuna caught the sunlight.

meanings.definition: The flesh of the tuna fish used as food.
meanings.sent1: The chef prepared a delicious tuna salad for the party.
meanings.sent2: Tuna is a popular choice for sushi.
meanings.sent3: Why did the sandwich go to the seafood party alone? It couldn't find a 'tuna' date!
meanings.sent4: The aroma of grilled tuna filled the kitchen.
meanings.sent5: The tuna melt made my mouth water.

meanings.definition: A tin or can containing tuna fish.
meanings.sent1: I grabbed a can of tuna from the pantry for a quick meal.
meanings.sent2: The grocery store had a sale on tuna tins.
meanings.sent3: Why did the tuna can go to school? To get a little 'can'education!
meanings.sent4: The shelves were stocked with tuna cans of all sizes.
meanings.sent5: The label on the tuna tin was colorful and eye-catching.
